sentence: Whoever wins will take on State Attorney General Josh Shapiro, the presumptive Democratic nominee, who had $16 million in his campaign account at the close of the three-month period ending March 28 — a huge financial advantage over his prospective GOP rivals.
author: WKOK Staff
title: PA Headlines: DNA Used in I-81 IDs, GOP Candidate Spending Update

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney Generals Josh Shapiro announced the arrests Tuesday.
author: Vivian Muniz
title: AG: Five arrested in Schuylkill County drug bust

sentence: “Increasingly, we’re seeing fentanyl replace heroin as the dominant opioid here in Pennsylvania, because of its low cost – as little as 79 cents a dose.” Attorney General Josh Shapiro said in a statement announcing the arrests.
author: South Schuylkill News
title: Five charged in Schuylkill County drug ring
